alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Elmore (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 6:12PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Autauga and northwestern Elmore Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 612 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Millbrook, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Prattville, Millbrook, Elmore, Coosada, Deatsville, Marbury, Titus, Weoka Mills, Jordan Lake, Ten Cedar Estates, Holtville, Wetumpka Municipal Airport, Jordan Dam and Speigner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Birmingham.
